item.title: SQL Error Converting The Data Type
item.description: A team mate of mine approached me asking for help in debugging an issue that has been ongoing for a while. He mentioned that the issue with query he was dealing with was sporadic and doesn’t happen in all environments. That sounded interesting. I asked him to pull up a chair so we can go over it together. The problem was with a query that used to run fine for a long time and started failing a couple of weeks ago.
